items.sentence: Tom enjoys taking a nap in the early afternoon.
Tom examined the photo with a magnifying glass.
Tom explained his plan to everyone in the room.
Tom fell asleep as soon as the lights went out.
Tom is the smartest person that I\'ve ever met.
It was a pity Tom couldn\'t go camping with us.
It was the most beautiful thing I\'d ever seen.
You\'re the only one here who likes basketball.
Tom said he wished he\'d given flowers to Mary.
Tom told me that he didn\'t feel like laughing.
